message.electionInstruction: In the following list, please select at most {maxChoices} candidates. You may click on a candidate"s name to see their motivation and presentation.
message.invalidBallot: {invalidCount} ballot was ignored while counting because it was invalid. Please check the CSV file for more information.
message.invalidBallots: {invalidCount} ballots were ignored while counting because they were invalid. Please check the CSV file for more information.
message.unsupportedExplanation: This site does not support your browser. Please switch to a recent version of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox or Internet Explorer 11
message.voteAgain: You have already voted in this election. If you choose to vote again, only your last vote will be counted.
message.cast: Your vote has been cast successfully
message.noElections: There are not currently any elections for you to vote in.
message.maint: The system is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
